channel.title: Technology Community Rails Wired Rant on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Technology Community Rails Wired Rant on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Rails and Wired magazine
item.description: Apparently I am in the March Wired magazine. I am not sure exactly what the title of the article or the exact content - but I was interview about my views on the rails community as someone who left the community and moved on to other things. (I think - I haven’t seen it - just heard that i was in it.) My history with rails is a tumultuous one. I first played with rails pre 1.
